Test the setting of the image-set functions.

On success, you will see a series of "PASS" messages, followed by "TEST COMPLETE".



Single value for background-image : image-set(url("http://www.webkit.org/a") 1x)
PASS testComputedStyle(`background-image`, `image-set(url("http://www.webkit.org/a") 1x)`) is "image-set(url(\"http://www.webkit.org/a\") 1x)"


Single value for background-image : -webkit-image-set(url("http://www.webkit.org/a") 1x)
PASS testComputedStyle(`background-image`, `-webkit-image-set(url("http://www.webkit.org/a") 1x)`) is "image-set(url(\"http://www.webkit.org/a\") 1x)"
